data.message: I can no longer access my most recent feed anymore. Please stop making us use the top stories feed by default and let us choose what we want to see, I do not want stories from 4/5 hours ago, if I wanted to I'd scroll down myself.

replies.message: Hi Barry. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2cfYIRw. -Jessica
I don't have the most recent view anymore on Facebook iOS app
Facebook also when I use the search bar in my app it comes up with a list of "text" results instead of icons and links to pages and profiles. This is a step way far back!!!
Thanks for bringing this to our attention, Tiffany. Please report this to us here: http://bit.ly/2cg8ymw. -Kevin
Uh, you've wasted your invested money then, because no one likes top stories.
Facebook Dear Facebook my account was lacked  i don't know why i m try many time but you can,t my ID Why ?

Facebook  Every time I get on Facebook on my phone,  I keep getting old post and it gets aggravating to where I don't even wanna be on Facebook anymore,  I don't want to see post that are 2-3 days old, I want to see the most recent post, and I or should I say we because others have the same problem shouldn't have to go into Feeds every time and click on most recent just to get the most recent post to come up.  Hope the problem gets fixed soon. Because ITS VERY AGGRAVATING.
I was wondering why I keep seeing the same stories over and over again from days ago. When I click most recent stories it goes back to the old feed within a few minutes!

It takes like 4 taps to get to recent stores for iOS and then if you accidentally swipe instead of scroll you have to start over again at the top of the feed. I really hate this change. I loved Facebook but this ruined it for me. The SAME stories for days!!
Annette Leverich Heidenreich Yes!! So annoying! 😒😳
